title: Subscription Cancelled
description: Identify this event with the HTTP POST parameter `alert_name` with a value of `subscription_cancelled`

alert_id.title: Alert ID
alert_id.description: The unique identifier for this Paddle webhook alert. Integer value sent as a string.

cancellation_effective_date.description: The date the cancellation should come into effect, taking the customer’s most recent payment into account. The customer should be able to use the service they've subscribed to up until this date.

checkout_id.title: Checkout ID
checkout_id.description: The checkout id of the order created.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Eg: `USD`, `GBP`. See [Supported Currencies](/reference/platform-parameters/supported-currencies).

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the customer.

event_time.title: Event Time
event_time.description: The date and time the event was triggered in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).

marketing_consent.title: Marketing Consent
marketing_consent.description: The value of this field `0` or `1` indicates whether the user has agreed to receive marketing messages from the vendor.

passthrough.title: Passthrough
passthrough.description: This field contains any values that you passed into the checkout using the `passthrough` parameter. See the [Pass Parameters documentation](/guides/how-tos/checkout/pass-parameters#sending-additional-user-data) for more information.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of products or subscription seats sold in the transaction.

status.title: Status
status.description: This is the current status of the subscription. A list of possible values and their meanings can be found under [Event Statuses](/reference/platform-parameters/event-statuses).

subscription_id.title: Subscription ID
subscription_id.description: This is the unique Subscription ID for this customer’s subscription. You should store this with the customer in your database, as it is needed for making API calls.

subscription_plan_id.title: Subscription Plan ID
subscription_plan_id.description: The ID of the Subscription Plan the customer is subscribed to. (This is the value that will change upon plan change).

unit_price.title: Unit Price
unit_price.description: The price per unit of the subscription.

p_signature.title: P Signature
p_signature.description: This field contains an encrypted token that you can use to verify the request authenticity. See [Verifying Webhooks](/webhook-reference/verifying-webhooks).
